website_summaries.verdict: Makes smoking and grilling more fun and easy with these three tools for grilling, smoking, shredding, basting, lifting, and more.
pros: Claws, heat resistant glove, eBook of recipes, and baster included in one order
A formidable asset to your arsenal of grilling/ smoking tools
Gives more stability than a meat fork
Very efficient and faster than using two forks
The fact they can go in the dishwasher and never rust or corrode is great
cons: Brush may fall apart after one use
Gloves may be hard to put on for some
Plastic backside of the claws are hollow and open, which could trap food and make them difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the claws!! The claws were awesome for pulled pork. They tore through the meat and did an excellent job of holding hot brisket while I cut it. The silicone gloves where equally impressive. Why haven't I owned a pair of these gloves for grilling before!? They made moving big briskets that were piping hot very easy. Awesome products. Thanks so much for great products at great prices and awesome customer service. I know what Dad is getting for father's day!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: I will not recommend this unless you are a cheapo charlie yourself and ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very stiff. If you have a lot of work do with them, your hands will become fatigued quickly. The claws are cheapo charlie plastic. The back side of the claws are hollow and open which will trap food making it difficult to clean and keep sanitary. I am also concerned that plastic will break off while shredding meat. The brush is a cheap 25 cent brush. I will not recommend this unless you are a cheapo charlie yourself and you like low quality products. Returning to Amazon as soon as I can figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: BBQ MAN'S DREAM!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Father's Day. He is a lover of BBQ, so this adds a new element to his grilling repertoire. I gave it to him already even though Father's Day is a week away. He made a beef brisket and created shredded brisket burgers. Delish! The oven fits work great and come in handy when boiling noodles and such. The baster is ok, nothing to write home about, but everything else is a HUGE thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Uhapi Beauty

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THESE GLOVES!!!
customer_reviews.text: After using the Silicone Gloves I Quickly Learned that they were a Joke!!! Not only did they not help in regards to working with the food on the Smoker side of my Offset Smoker, They were difficult to get on as well as off! The TRUE Heat Resistant Gloves were the ones that are made from Nomex. these gloves are Totally Unacceptable to me and need to go back to the company that markets them. The Only thing to be of use from that box of stuff was the Brush and Meat Claw's. ( They worked fairly well.) The gloves are a NO GO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Good but stiff!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were not what I was expecting. They are good for some quick use, but anything prolonged and the glove will heat up and the heat transfer to the inside of the glove is pretty quick. These will not be my go-to-glove for cooking, but more for food prep. But then there is another annoying part is these gloves are stiff and while they bend - it takes a fair amount of unnatural force to attempt to use them naturally. I think I want something more pliable. The baster in this set - meh, its whatever it will do a job. The claws are pretty nice, exactly what the picture shows - they are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Martin

customer_reviews.title: This package of gloves, shredder and baster are great tools for cooking on the grill or oven!!
customer_reviews.text: This package of gloves, shredder and baster are great tools for cooking on the grill or oven!! The gloves are slightly tight for those of us who have large hands but still workable. They keep the heat out of handling hot food or hot pans and easily wash off! The shredder works great ,makes light work and shreds easier & faster than forks. The baster does a great job of spreading the sauces on meat and easy to clean. We love each of these tools plus all the recipes!!
customer_reviews.author: Fun2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Good products.  Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use the gloves almost every weekend when I fire up the smoker. The gloves work very well, but when holding very hot things, you can start feeling the heat after a minute or so. I am not brave enough to do the boiling water test, although I would bet for 30 seconds you would be fine. The bear claws are sturdy and work well for pulling a pork butt.
customer_reviews.author: The Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Good for hands size large or smaller
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set. However, the gloves are about equivalent to a size large, so if you have bigger hands, you might need to find a different set. Pros: shred meat quickly, gloves provide good heat protection. Cons: nice to have extra large glove size for bigger hands.
customer_reviews.author: donne572

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are too small!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the claws being a flimsy McDonalds toy, the gloves are of no use. They barely fit my 14 year old son, much less me. Once you do get the gloves on and the heat starts burning through you will be in great misery. They are almost impossible to get off once your hands start to sweat. I had to fill them with cold water and blow air into them to remove. Would make great Chinese finger handcuffs, therefore two stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: The gloves did not protect your hands on the grill ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves did not protect your hands on the grill! They were holding the heat and my husband couldn't pull them off fast enough! Couldn't find the receipt or I would've asked for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never knew you needed this, but you do
customer_reviews.text: Change from 4 to 5 stars. After an entire summer using this it's a much have for anyone that smokes meat and/or BBQ. These our items that u never knew u needed but then when u get them u can't live without them. I use the gloves yr round and the claws can rip thru anything. Only down rid is the gloves, when they get wet u have to really grip the pan, if u just lay your hands under something 100% your going to drop it
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT H.

customer_reviews.title: slipery
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good idea, would return but don't have box items came in, when you use these gloves be careful everything is slippery like trying to pick up oil, but as far as picking up something hot works great as long as it doesn't slide through your gloves
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The brush arrived with the top unattached ( bad glue )
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is all very very cheaply made . The brush arrived with the top unattached ( bad glue ). The claws are junk they are plastic , like a board game piece . They aren't even hollow , they're molded in the shape of meat claws . The neoprene gloves have no insulation inside , BUYER BEWARE !!! If you are looking for a good set of claws , this is not them . PURE JUNK !!
customer_reviews.author: jonathon burnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: These make it easy to grab a not dish out of the oven or off the grill or smoker. My 4 star rating is due to the fact that when you are handling something greasy (like pulled pork) the grease on the gloves makes the silicone surface very slippery and hard to grip anything. This grease is moderately challenging to wash off out of the many raised nobs on the surface of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Music teacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice BBQ Essentials
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The meat shredders are lite, easy to hold, and do a great job shredding beef, chicken, etc. The gloves work nicely for use when brushing sauce onto meat on the grill, saves your hands from getting baked. Don't try grabbing anything oven temp for long with them tho. The heat gets through pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Do not Bother
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are useless. They don't protect from anything warmer than your breath and once you get them on and use them, it is close to impossible to get them off. So basically I paid for a brush and claws to pick meat up with. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton W. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: So useful!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so pleased and surprised to receive these items. I think the gloves are his favorite as they eliminate all the mess when removing things from the smoker. They clean up so easy and he does not ruin my ovgloves! Guess you could say there are two happy campers with this order! Would we order again, we will for our son who has a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money just for the recipes alone, but the product is great
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice set! The silicone gloves are great because you can pick up food out of a pressure cooker with them, then just wash your hands with them on, dry; and they are ready to be used again. Love them. I actually bought this set for the claws. Not only are they good for pulling pork, they are great for picking up meat off the grill, like a whole chicken. I really love the recipes sent to my email. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Gloves will be great for you if you have small hands.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is okay, haven't used the claws yet but they should be okay as well. The gloves? Well I have medium sized hands and these gloves are too small. They are hard to get on and off when clean but after handling meat they are super slippery and you just about have to pull them off with a clean dry cloth. Other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: DutchJR

customer_reviews.title: SHREDDERS ARE THE BOMB
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Started with the purchase of one, then I added two more to my gift list. All three of our backyard BBQ "professionals" have raved about the product. Their favorite has been the shredder for the pulled pork! The gloves are great too and I do not believe any of them have commented on the brush. These boys have raved about the shredder to all their friends and have shown them off to the Fort Hood Fire Department!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the pullers, like the fork, very indifferent about the gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the shredders and they are great. I thought the gloves would be a nice addition but they are so slippery that they are almost useless due to their slipperiness. The meat fork is nice and works well with the claws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "you have to put your hands in it to get the best..
customer_reviews.text: I cannot not say how "Awesome" this kit is when it comes to grilling/cooking meals for friends and family. I am sooooo impressed with the materials and their use. I was always told as a young "cook" that, "you have to put your hands in it to get the best...." Well grandma, now I can really tear into those hot meats and nothing is wasted. I HIGHLLY recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are useless, baster is junk, meat shredders are OK
customer_reviews.text: Wish I hadn’t bought this. While the gloves DO insulate your hands, they become so slippery after touching meat that you cannot grip anything. I have to have help getting them off they are so slick! As far as the meat shredders go, they do the job. Just wish the gloves weren’t so useless. The baster.....it’s a throw-away.
customer_reviews.author: Nogrey

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are great
customer_reviews.text: I used the gloves this weekend while cooking a brisket. They worked great. I was able to just grab the meat when it was time to come out of the smoker and transfer it to a cooler with not problem. The gloves are easily washable. I haven't tried yet but I would assume they are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly for the use of the gloves... have to say very disappointed in them. They’re not very heat resistant at all. Almost impossible to clean and the list could go on. The brush, straight out of the box the head was not in line with the handle. Tried to use one time and the head ended up falling off. Overall very low quality item. May be good for the price you put for them, but in my opinion I’d spend the extra money on something a little higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad.
customer_reviews.text: About what you would expect from a Chinese product. They work ok and the claws are hard plastic. The brush is Teflon (ish), but for the price it will work and you can use them more than once. Probably will not last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pepsinut

customer_reviews.title: Works good but get slippery fast.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit well and worked perfectly for handling food right off the smoker and onto the butcher block. Definitely heat resistant, kept my hands clean, and were easy to wash when I was done. However, they get super slippery and I was unable to get them off without help because I could not grip them with the opposite hand. Baster is typical and comes apart to make easy to clean. Haven't used the claws yet but they seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pochebit

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the Occasional Pit Master
customer_reviews.text: There are better options out there I am sure. The gloves are protective but VERY slippery. Easy to wash but the flexibility is no where close to what i expected. The forks are good for separating brisket and other proteins but not really a selling factor for me. The other two included products aren't anything special but the do serve a purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Superior.Shores

customer_reviews.title: The claws I never use because they are too spread apart for the shred I like to get on meats
customer_reviews.text: This set is ok. Maybe for occasional use they would work. The gloves are too short and too small for real usefulness for us. Also very hard to move in them. Very thick. We prefer the "rubber kitchen glove" style from other companies. The claws I never use because they are too spread apart for the shred I like to get on meats. The brush is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Momma in Montana

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: cheap. gloves are IMPOSSIBLE to get off if you get any kind of cooking item juice on then. bear claws are cheap plastic. gloves arent lined and will only take about 10 seconds of a 220* item before you start to get burned. if i had to do over again, i wouldnt buy this set......then again, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Not too thrilled
customer_reviews.text: The temperature that they are good for varies. The size is a little tight for men with big hands. The shredders are made of plastic which disappointed me. The one good thing is that they are easy to clean and the baster is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to return these. The whole kit is very nice but I do not like the fact the gloves are unlined and are hard to get on and off. With a cotton lining I would rate these a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bowers

customer_reviews.title: gloves are heat resistent but get hot
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are heat resisted but get hot after you hold something hot . have to be careful but they do work. The shredders are amazing and can really shred that pork.
customer_reviews.author: apopnj

customer_reviews.title: nice set
customer_reviews.text: Comes in handy not just for grilling! I used the gloves to open jars. Works great. The claws are good but I wish they didn't have hollow teeth in the back. It makes them hard to clean. But over all a nice set. Sturdy and well made. Very prompt delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: RUSTY HOGLAND

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Basic Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to have to do almost any large grilling, smoking or even frying. Gloves really do work and clean up easy. Almost nothing sticks to them. I used them Thanksgiving to handle swapping turkeys from fryer literally seconds out of the oil. Placed done bird on platter and removed inner stand for the next bird. I felt no heat at all. Claws made for easy caving. They work super for pulling and shredding pork roasts. Flipping a brisket was a snap and back into smoker losing almost no reduction in temperature.
customer_reviews.author: jrleen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great on time. Shredded my 10 lb smokedpork butt with ease. Great product. Only negative was I did not get these years ago. Alot easier than using 2 forks. AAA +++. HIGHLY Recommend. Gloves are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Hensler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money, gloves hard to take off.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves worked well, no heat while working with my smoker (only 200 degrees F). Only complaint is they are difficult to remove after use as the pork shoulder I handled was very greasy. Maybe a larger size would have helped, I typically wear size Large glove. The claws worked well, but the meat was extremely tender (11 hour smoke). Haven't used brush yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Steinbacher

customer_reviews.title: Useful and much appreciated gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift for brother in law. He absolutely LOVES the claws, since hes not great at hand-shredding the meats. The gloves keep him safe and the basting brush is handy for bbq, seasoning mixes, and juices. Overall a great purchase. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not as "heat resistant" as you might believe
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to reach into the fires of Mordor to retrieve the Ring. Nah, I was barely able to hold my hand over the grill longer than without the gloves... then I had to figure out how to rip the dang things off because they held heat. That was fun. Might be useful for yanking stuff off the grill, but don't expect to be able to linger over the heat for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Burned my hand through the mitts
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but they don't work for the BBQ like they say. The first time I tried to pull my vegetable rack off the grill while wearing these, I burned my hand through the mitts. My grill doesn't even heat over 450 degrees since its a wood fired Traeger, so I can't imagine what would happen if I had been grilling on a normal grill. Haven't tried the other accessories yet. May be returning these for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gloves aren't very flexible but work for taking something off the grill. Just can't really move in them. Claws work great. Brush is fine.
customer_reviews.author: sparkle barbie

customer_reviews.title: Rips easy
customer_reviews.text: The gloves work good enough at blocking heat, but they do not provide much dexterity. They also rip easily. A finger ripped clean off while trying to take the glove off the first time using them.
customer_reviews.author: Blackguy

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a significant other who was actually seeing another woman on the side THE ENTIRE TIME! I don't have a smoker, however, these are the best gloves ever! I use them all the time during baking and cooking. I'm so happy I kept this purchase. And not him. Woman's Dream Set.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is good. As expected, I can still feel the heat on my fingers if picking the grill to add more charcoals. But if I fold in half and then hold the grill it does provide better insulation. But the set is a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: online_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my annual 4th of July cookout and everything worked perfectly! I was able to move meat around that had been on the smoker for 8 hours and gloves protected my hands great. Claws were a blessing when it came to shredding the pork and brush is top quality also. I didn't receive the 3 e-books with recipes but I am planning them contacting them to see if I missed something in the details. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: roy hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BUY !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent complete grilling combination. Was looking for just the claws after using my son's on Super Bowl Sunday for my pulled pork, they worked very well. When searching I came upon this offer which was very economically affordable and included the gloves which I intended to purchase at some point, so I did. Used the claws this weekend and am very glad that they were available,
customer_reviews.author: Big-John

customer_reviews.title: LOVED the gloves
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a pig roast. LOVED the gloves. Wore them for two straight hours while breaking down a 300lb roast pig. Never got uncomfortably hot at all, but they are a little sweaty. If this was a review for just them, it would be five stars. The claws were ok, but I used them more for serving. It was easier to shred the meat with just the gloves! And the brush fell apart an hour into use. So, final thought: just get the gloves and don't bother with the combo.
customer_reviews.author: michael bagley

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these products twice now: Once with a pork shoulder and once with ribs. The gloves work great and keep my hands from getting burned, and the shredders really make quick work of pulling apart the pork shoulder. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: AEE1118

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for BBQ people. The silicone glove makes handling hot meats easy to spread. I was surprised at how much I liked the basting brush. It can slather on sauces or marinades
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes smoking and grilling more enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I love my smoker but was always in trouble for using pot holders to remove the wire racks. These are perfect. At don point I think I'll buy another pair for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: WaltA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat it for the price. The quality is good and they are pretty easy to clean. Only downside is if you have wet hands, it can be difficult to slide them on. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Store items inside after use.
customer_reviews.text: The set works great. The gloves are not quite as heat resistant as I expected, but I have never used a silicone-type material for gloves before. One caveat, do NOT store gloves outside, as the chipmunks love to nibble on them. Yes, I did wash them, but I guess they like the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Goodyt

customer_reviews.title: Really worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: Set is great, I recomend super glue gel to keep.the brush head on, I know it's removable for cleaning but it pops off sometimes if you brush it sideways..no big deal. The gloves clean up easily and work great. The shreder works great as a roast or chicken grabber to move without droping them.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Claw is great
customer_reviews.text: The claws make pulled pork sandwiches a breeze. The mitts are not the best though. They let a lot of heat through. I thought that they would be like a pot holder, but they are not. They are almost unuseable because it is too hot to hold the meat with them.
customer_reviews.author: dannielle slater

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I knocked out 6 racks of babyback ribs this weekend with these gloves. I don't know about the rest of the items but the gloves worked perfectly. I could handle any of the hot surfaces, they gripped well, and did not melt themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Bear claws used for pulled pork ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Bear claws used for pulled pork. Gloves used to turn meat on grill. Enclosed directions mention to learn your heat tolerance when wearing gloves; sage advice. All items are easy to clean with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Nossaman

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor cooks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for a gift for his smoker out back and he loves it! He is a master of the smoked meats and this is the perfect addition. Wish I had bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ideal to pull pork and such... getting hot gristle off is a pain. Makes it easy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: really useful! gloves do a good job of insulating heat
customer_reviews.text: really useful! gloves do a good job of insulating heat, I dont' have to wear cotton gloves underneath. The claws work well, but both the gloves and the claws are very slippery. Also, the gloves are a bit tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My old bbq gloves wore out after about 10 years and I bought these as a replacement pair. Turns out that even though they are well made I don't are for the dimpling. It doesn't allow for as good a grip as my old gloves. The meat hooks/shredders work very well (even though they are nylon) so nothing to really complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Pulled Pork set
customer_reviews.text: I got a new smoker, and pulled pork for two months with burnt fingers. I'd been given a different set of gloves and claws, but the gloves were stiff and the claws ineffective. this set is perfect. I almost cried the first time I pulled with it. It's a dream. Gloves fit well (I have size med to large glove hands) and gloves do a great job of shielding you from the temps involved.
customer_reviews.author: RB - Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my hubby for Christmas. He LOVES them. Uses them often with any grilling and uses the shredder/claw more than he thought he would.
customer_reviews.author: christy m pruitt

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are great for handling the hot meat straight out of the smoker and the shredder claws with a bit of practice make short work of the shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Claws are sharp
customer_reviews.text: The shredders are great. They have a cavity back which makes them a little uncomfortable when really pulling through meat. But super sharp and easily tear through lots of meat types.
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them. He uses the claws to grab a large hunk of meat (usually a turkey) from the smoker so it stays together better. Great gift for him indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great for any kind of BBQing
customer_reviews.text: I use these along with my Pit Boss smoker and it has everything you need. The meat shredders work great for pulled pork and the gloves grip meat well with little heat transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best barbecue glove I have ever used. It is a great quality glove. The brush and the claws also are made very well. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Value!
customer_reviews.text: Im new to the bbq world and pulled pork etc. when I came across these and saw the price I couldn’t resist trying them out but had low expectations. Wow was I wrong! These thing are shredders! Simple to use but cut the shredding time by at least 70%.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moses

customer_reviews.title: Both sons say they are the best and everyone that grills needs to own this set
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these for my son for Christmas. He really uses them and loves them, in fact he sang his praises of them so much that I ordered a set for my bonus son for his birthday in April. He does alot of grilling in his company job. He has sent me two pictures of him using them on his job. He loves them. Both sons say they are the best and everyone that grills needs to own this set.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Trussell

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ bundle is fine, but not for me. The claws are plastic and are like hollow on the back - it's not a solid claw all the way around. And, though it's not a problem with the product, the gloves are too small for me, so I don't even get to use them.
customer_reviews.author: EmZo

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality claws
customer_reviews.text: The brush and gloves are good quality, but the meat claws are just hollowed plastic. They seem cheap and I am sure they will eventually break, let's just hope someone doesn't find a "claw" in their sandwich...
customer_reviews.author: M. Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Great for general purpose
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are great for the use of fingers and they do somewhat hold up to the heat, but they don't hold up great. I do quite a bit of smoking and when pulling the meats out they do get a bit warm, then trying to take them off when they have grease or something on them is really tough as they stick to your hands
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: I got this today TRIED the glove on, pulled ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this today TRIED the glove on, pulled the glove off and the middle finger pulled off the glove..
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: great gifts for the BBQ!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husbands birthday. The gloves are great. I have used them for the grill and the oven too. They are easily cleaned and work great! The shredders are awesome. My father in law is a retired Chef (I got the same gift for his birthday) and he is impressed with the ease in shredding an entire pork roast in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: nancy elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Products in this package!
customer_reviews.text: The items were exactly as described. The company is fantastic and followed up to make sure I was pleased with my order. They emailed me a couple of recipe books, which was a nice touch. In today's day and age, it's nice to deal with a company that takes the time to reach out to their customers. Thank you Grace Kitchenwares for the great merchandise!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: So So satisfied
customer_reviews.text: There good with heat, wish they were a little roomier and maybe not as stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products. Not necessarily must-have
customer_reviews.text: Great products. Not necessarily must-have, but they do the job and makes my prep and post-cooked meat easier to handle. I was hoping I could get a larger size glove but this is the largest they offer for now.
customer_reviews.author: Owner_Operator

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for getting that hot Pork Butt out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for getting that hot Pork Butt out of the smoker. Set her down and tear it apart for some great pulled pork. The only thing is I have fairly large hands and the gloves are a bit tight in the distance between the thumb and index finger. I have to wear them a little loose to be able to bend my fingers correctly. Kind of a pain in the rear to take them off once they are greasy .
customer_reviews.author: NDizzo13

customer_reviews.title: Great and does exactly what is say it will go
customer_reviews.text: Great and does exactly what is say it will go. No more burning your hands pulling meat out of the smoker. The shredder works great too. I had no idea I was over shredding my pork until I used this product. I will definitely buy this again when needed. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is I wish the gloves were a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice for grilling
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are extremely difficult to get on if you have larger hands. They are also too slick to use effectively. They do wash easily however. Will look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Just Gonna Send It

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and not heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: Have used these in a commercial restaurant. They do not hold up to heat as rated. Our convection oven runs at 425 and staff are close to getting burns trying to pull sheet pans out of the oven if holding for longer than a few seconds. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son-in-law to use with his new smoker. The gloves are great for handling the heat and the claws worked real well on the park shoulder he made this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Small Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very small. In my opinion they are for women. As far as the quality look of them, they are OK but the size is way too small to feel comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Noe

customer_reviews.title: If you use your smoker a lot you need to have these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great product.... my hands did not get hot.......I use them all the time
customer_reviews.author: April Fix

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap set! Get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed claws are not very good, gloves are satisfactory at best, not made for xl hands
customer_reviews.author: juiceman

customer_reviews.title: Great started kit
customer_reviews.text: This a nice set to get your started smoking and cooking meat. I will not have any more burned fingers trying to move the meat about on the smoker. The claws to pull meat are amazing. I was able to pull an entire pork butt in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: B. Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Buy your items separately from someplace else instead
customer_reviews.text: Gloves were a little too small for my hands. I am a male and I can barely palm a basketball. Didn't come with the brush. Get better quality and buy different items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Gloves work great except when oily their hard to get off very slippery
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Havner

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect in shredding roast pork
customer_reviews.text: My son, the one who grills all the time, is very happy with his mitts and the bear claw shredders. They work beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: kpk

customer_reviews.title: Sooo slippery making it difficult to hold anything
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are terrible. Food makes them way too slippery to hold anything and if you have smaller hands they don’t bend easy and are cumbersome. I couldn’t hold anything securely with them. One star bc they are heat resistant.
customer_reviews.author: STR, MI

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Got a smoker and started to cook some meats and needed a pair gloves that you can use to pick up the hot meat, i would recommend theese to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jerred Ellenburg

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Wow, why didn’t I buy this sooner. The gloves are so useful I don’t feel any heat and I can handle the good easily. The Shredders did easy work of pulling apart a pork butt/.
customer_reviews.author: James L Pizano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. Gloves are very nice, and the claws are sturdy. Would recommend to anyone that grills or smokes a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin savage

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother-in-law, he absolutely loved it and they worked perfect on his next pork butt he smoked.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't grab a hot iron skillet, you'll get burned between the dimples on the glove.
customer_reviews.text: Like the shredders, but be careful with the glove, I have never burned myself while wearing a glove until wearing these. Now I just use them to pull the plate setter from my BGE when I'm reverse searing a steak.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Soliz

customer_reviews.title: This set is an awesome addition to my ever increasing set of tool for ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is an awesome addition to my ever increasing set of tool for the Kitchen. The gloves work great but those meat claws. I use them at work because we cook about 200 lbs of pulled pork every couple of days and these claws make shredding the pork so much faster. Just a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: David Starkweather

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby for a Christmas present to go with his new smoker. He loves it! The glove is awesome (I use it in the kitchen too) and the claws work so well to shred. Such a good value!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Gloves broke at first try!
customer_reviews.text: First Time using these gloves ! When I wAs taking theme off fingers broke off ! Had to throw them out ! Money down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon martinez

customer_reviews.title: great set of gloves and shredders!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of gloves pulled the pork right off the smoker at 190 and didn't feel a thing. The handles are plastic but worked well for the two times i've used them and don't feel like they are going break. the brush is well a brush it worked well, comes off the top a little easier than i would like but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Moeg

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great and are incredibly easy to clean. A must have for anyone who grills or smokes food.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L. Carpenter

product_meta.title: GK’s 3 + 3 BBQ Man’s Dream Set: Silicone BBQ Grill Gloves Plus Meat Shredder Claws Plus Silicone Basting Brush Plus 3 eBooks w/ 344 Recipes for Roasting, Grilling and Baking
feature_bullets: BBQ MANS DREAM SET - Make smoking and grilling more exciting and effortless with these 3 great tools for grilling, smoking, shredding, basting, lifting and more. This SUPERIOR VALUE SET of 3 Top Selling BBQ tools are functionally matched and very reasonably priced with 100% money back satisfaction guarantee. You have Zero chances of going wrong with a GK!
EASY, NOT MESSY – The food grade bbq silicone gloves that were designed for you to directly pick up and handle food. Wash and reuse in seconds. No more dirty mitts!

SHREDDERS ARE THE BOMB – shredding is very fast, very easy and quite fun frankly. The claws are sleek, solid, light weight, super strong, super sharp and dishwasher safe. 8in SILICONE BASTING BRUSH leaves no mane behind on food and the lines, curves and fine finish are pretty!

3 EXCITING RECIPE EBOOKS– GK’s “22 Exciting Recipes for GRILLING AND BROILING”, GK’s “22 Exciting Recipes for ROASTING AND BAKING” and “300 Recipes for The Grill”. You will always have something new and interesting to try and to enjoy.

ONLY THE BEST FOR YOU – We guarantee our Quality is at par with the very best but with added value and guaranteed quick response customer service you can depend on. If we don’t answer in 24 hours, expect a gift from us!
